labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australia', 'Gran Bretaña', 'Suecia', 'Acciones del sector industrial', 'Bienes y servicios de consumo no cíclico'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australia', 'Gran Bretaña', 'Suecia']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Bélgica', 'Canadá', 'Japón', 'Acciones del sector financiero', 'Servicios de telecomunicaciones'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Bélgica', 'Canadá', 'Japón', 'Servicios de telecomunicaciones']
